title: Mexico : internet penetration 2000 to 2018
summary: Overall Percentage of individuals using internet has increased over the Year.
Percentage of individuals using internet is slightly increasing from 2009 to 2012, and lastly roughly constant from 2012 to 2014.
The steepest increase occurs in between the Year 2010 and 2011.
The highest Percentage of individuals using internet, of value 44.39 was reached at Year 2014
Minimum Percentage of individuals using internet about 26.34 was reached at Year 2009
min_summary: In general Percentage of individuals using internet has rose over the Year.
Percentage of individuals using internet is slightly increasing from 2009 to 2012, and lastly roughly constant from 2012 to 2014.
